title: Grilled Chicken, Tomato and Baby Greens Salad with Blue Cheese
directions: Brush chicken with oil; season with salt and pepper, to taste.  Grill 8 to 12 minutes or until no longer pink in the center (165 degrees F), turning once.  Cool chicken enough to handle; slice into thin strips.
Combine salad blend, tomatoes from pouch, cooked sliced chicken, avocado, bacon, egg and blue cheese in large bowl.  Toss with blue cheese dressing, to taste.
ingredients: 3/4 pound boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
Salt and ground black pepper, to taste
1 (7.75 ounce) package DOLE Extra Veggieâ„¢ with Grape Tomatoes
2 slices bacon, cooked, drained and crumbled
Bottled blue cheese dressing, to taste
